      • testTurnAndBetAndGetPotInPreFlop

        public void testTurnAndBetAndGetPotInPreFlop()
        5 players: master, player2(p2), player3(p3), player4(p4), player5(p5) Dealer is p5. So, SB is master, BB is p2, UTG is the p3. In preflop, the first call is p3.
